questions: Does this image show a wedding invitation card? Answer with yes or no.
Is the card shown hefty with eggshell textures and embossings? Answer with yes or no.
Are elegant decorations abstractly representing the couple included on the card? Answer with yes or no.
Is the usage of iconography sparing and minimalist on the card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the invitation include the specified text about the union of Image and Text? Answer with yes or no.
Is perfect typesetting used on the invitation? Answer with yes or no.
Is the invitation card placed on a tasteful wooden desk? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
Does the picture contain the time information of March 25, 2025? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image shows a card with text and design typical of a wedding invitation.
yes The card exhibits a textured appearance that suggests an eggshell texture and possible embossing details.
yes There are elegant abstract designs on the card which could represent aspects associated with the couple's theme or preferences.
no The card features a fair amount of iconography rather than being minimalist; the circular patterns and embossed elements are prominent.
no The text on the card does not mention anything specific about the union of Image and Text.
yes The text on the card appears to be well-arranged with intentional spacing and alignment for readability.
yes The card is resting atop a surface that has the natural grain and coloration of wood, indicative of a wooden desk.
no The text on the card is heavily distorted and unreadable, lacking in any form of coherent content.
no There is no discernible date, let alone the specific date of March 25, 2025, present on the card.
